text: Tini balalena -- ''he amara sampradaya! Tomara ki bhebe dekhecha -- ami yadi amara prabhura kacha theke spasta-pramane pratisthita thaki ebam tini yadi amake tamra tarapha theke anugraha pradana kare thakena, athaca tomadera kache eti jhapasa haye geche, amara ki tabe etite tomadera badhya karate pari yakhana tomara era prati birupa
